name: care-provider-finder
description: Find and compare care providers across the UK & Ireland. Search CQC (England), Care Inspectorate (Scotland), RQIA (Northern Ireland), and HIQA (Ireland) registries.
long_description: MCP server for finding and comparing care providers across the UK and Ireland. Real-time CQC API for England, plus bundled data for Scotland, Northern Ireland, and Ireland. Search by location, postcode, rating, and service type. Get detailed provider information, ratings analysis, and inspection history.
